segments.text: Off hand , I'd say the Reader's Digests is my favorite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of magazine is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? It is a weekly , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it enjoy popularity among the young generation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's so popular that it's sold out as soon as it reaches the bookstores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I think I should try to read one .
segments.speaker: S1
